actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide a more equitable standard for awarding the gold star lapel button.

summary.text: Sets conditions for the awarding of the gold star lapel button under the approval of the Secretary of Defense in instances of members of the Armed Forces who fall in armed conflict while serving with friendly foreign forces. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 1126)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide a more equitable standard for awarding the gold star lapel button.
